metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8905 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
do_core_note in readelf.c in libmagic.a in file 5.35 has a stack-based buffer over-read, related to file_printable, a different vulnerability than CVE-2018-10360.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8905` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

file - 1:5.32-2ubuntu0.2
libmagic-mgc - 1:5.32-2ubuntu0.2
libmagic1 - 1:5.32-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: file package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.32-2ubuntu0.2').
